verses.verse: You shall not <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> any <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, or <S%H7716>sheep<s%>, where is <S%H3971>blemish<s%>, or anything <S%H7451>evil<s%>: for that is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

If there be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H259>you<s%>, inside any of your <S%H8179>gates<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H376>you<s%>, man or <S%H802>woman<s%>, that has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H5674>transgressing<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,

And has <S%H3212>gone<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H8121>them<s%>, either the sun, or <S%H3394>moon<s%>, or any of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, which I have not <S%H6680>commanded<s%>;

And it be <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8085>you<s%>, and you have heard of <S%H1875>it<s%>, and inquired <S%H3190>diligently<s%>, <S%H571>and<s%>, behold, it be true, and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3559>certain<s%>, that such <S%H8441>abomination<s%> is <S%H6213>worked<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

At the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%>, shall he that is worthy of <S%H4191>death<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; but at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> he shall not be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.

The <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> shall be <S%H7223>first<s%> upon him to put him to <S%H4191>death<s%>, and <S%H314>afterward<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%>. So you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from among <S%H7130>you<s%>.

If there arise a <S%H1697>matter<s%> too <S%H6381>hard<s%> for you in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, between <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H1818>blood<s%>, between <S%H1779>plea<s%> and <S%H1779>plea<s%>, and between <S%H5061>stroke<s%> and <S%H5061>stroke<s%>, being <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H7379>controversy<s%> inside your <S%H8179>gates<s%>: then shall you <S%H6965>arise<s%>, and get you <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>;

And you shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and unto the <S%H8199>judge<s%> that shall be in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, and <S%H1875>inquire<s%>; and they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> you the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>:

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H6310>sentence<s%>, which they of that <S%H4725>place<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> shall <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H8104>you<s%>; and you shall observe to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that they inform <S%H3384>you<s%>:

According to the <S%H6310>sentence<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> which they shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H4941>you<s%>, and according to the judgment which they shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, you shall do: you shall not turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1697>sentence<s%> which they shall <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H3225>you<s%>, to the right hand, nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2087>presumptuously<s%>, and will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that <S%H5975>standeth<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> there before the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, or unto the <S%H8199>judge<s%>, even that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>: and you shall put <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H3372>fear<s%>, and do no more <S%H2102>presumptuously<s%>.

When you are <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and shall possess <S%H3427>it<s%>, and shall live in <S%H559>it<s%>, and shall say, I will <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H1471>me<s%>, like as all the nations that are about <S%H5439>me<s%>;

You shall in any <S%H7760>wise<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3068>you<s%>, whom the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%>: one from <S%H7130>among<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> shall you <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3201>you<s%>: you may not <S%H5414>set<s%> a <S%H5237>stranger<s%> over <S%H251>you<s%>, which is not your brother.

But he shall not <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> to <S%H5971>himself<s%>, nor cause the people to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to the end that he should <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>: forasmuch as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3254>you<s%>, You shall henceforth <S%H7725>return<s%> no more that <S%H1870>way<s%>.

Neither shall he <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> to <S%H3824>himself<s%>, that his heart <S%H5493>turn<s%> not <S%H3966>away<s%>: neither shall he greatly <S%H7235>multiply<s%> to himself <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And it shall <S%H3427>be<s%>, when he sits upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, that he shall <S%H3789>write<s%> him a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> out of that which is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>:

And it shall be with <S%H7121>him<s%>, and he shall read in it all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life<s%>: that he may <S%H3925>learn<s%> to <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%> and these <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, to do <S%H6213>them<s%>:

That his <S%H3824>heart<s%> be not lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> above his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and that he turn not <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>: to the end that he may <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> in his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, <S%H1121>he<s%>, and his sons, in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
